hiveArticle.body:
I have been to Bannerghatta National Park, In Bangalore India is one of the popular tourist destination in Bangalore which includes a Safari park, a Zoo, and a Butterfly Park. A variety of animals to be looked after here in this National park or Biological Park.

We were traveling in a Mini Bus, with well-protected cage and they were roaming around.

![20170723_151931.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRacAVm6A8xPZmzKsieDUib8AxVccWsxrASUfXSu4mxQA/20170723_151931.jpg)

![20170723_151932.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmPBLk5QKCvEoZcGR4CbLtrCy3wrZkQaVvSdBUCCSYWvCQ/20170723_151932.jpg)
